website_summaries.verdict: One of the best options for having an entire set of lens cases with a high level of protection.
pros: Large lens cases are big enough for longer telephoto lenses
Each case features a convenient carrying handle/strap to fasten to a bag or photography belt/vest
Compatible with lenses from various brands
cons: Smaller belt clips are too small to fit on some heavy-duty photography belts and vests

customer_reviews.title: A soft interior and good size!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the product listed above. I received these today. Items are as described. I am ok with the product. Let's see how much time last. They are good size and interior is soft, see pictures!
customer_reviews.author: JARELLANO

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but for the price and with slimmer lenses No problem
customer_reviews.text: They're a bit tight around most of my lenses. But the price and the material plus little features on the sleeves get a plus. If you like to keep your hoods with your lenses I'd double check to make sure these arent too small. Even if they do fit the fit might be a bit tight for your liking. Honestly I'm giving this 5 stars because I couldn't find my treat bag and I was able to use the smaller one as a treat bag while walking my dog. Can be used for other stuff :P
customer_reviews.author: BobertphotoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, good padding, but not 100% water- or dust-proof
customer_reviews.text: These are well padded, have good seams, and are in general well manufactured. The sizes work well from smaller to larger zoom lenses, and the diameter of the bags increases proportionally. One of my objectives has a larger 77mm diameter lens, and it barely fit into the medium-sized bags. Photographers with large diameter lenses should probably look elsewhere. The bags are closed using a pull-line, making them not 100% dust- or water-proof. Also, the soft purple top material is at best water-repellent, but won't withstand a heavy downpour.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive protection
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed to really protect my lenses when out and about. I only have 2 lenses, so I have 2 pouches left. One I put in my camera bag first and then set the camera on top of it for extra padding. The other is the really long one. Maybe I’ll need it if I get a very long telephoto lends. Anyway, these were inexpensive and work great at protecting the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: M. Auchter

customer_reviews.title: These lens cases will not properly fit Olympus M. ...
customer_reviews.text: These lens cases will not properly fit Olympus M. Zuiko lenses or Pancakes. I believe they may suit a full frame lenses however I did not purchase these for that purpose. Don't let the picture deceive you, these cases are large. They provide plenty room if you have large lenses however I believe they would be too short as they don't seem to follow standard lens sizes (lengths).
customer_reviews.author: Original GuruTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping safe while hiking
customer_reviews.text: I got these to hold my extra lenses with me while I hike so I can access them easily and change them but also keep them protected from the elements and other things in my backpack. They fit my lenses perfectly and sit well in my pack. Happy with the price!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good cases for all my lenses at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: As I've been accumulating more lenses for my DSLR, I've needed to get more cases to protect them. These are fine. I probably won't use the largest case, as the longest zoom lens fits easily into one of the middle size ones, but it's nice to have a set that can be switched around as I add or remove lenses. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are decent for the price. My biggest gripe is majority of my lenses are too big. I shoot concerts and I need to be able to switch lenses fairly quickly. These make it a bit difficult to do. It's a struggle to get them out. If you just need something to carry lenses in and you're not needing to do quick changes these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Horror Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Get these!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use the canon 50mm prime on the smallest one, next size up I used it for my Sigma Art 35 mm, and next size up used for Canon 24-105mm lens. Fit perfect with great cushion support.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best for storage but inconvenient for everyday useage
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed neoprene lens cases with draw-string closure. Tripod mounts will NOT fit nor will the lens hoods. All my canon lenses fit. Even the 70-200 f2.8L II IS USM fit in the largest pouch bag/ I am using these pouches as protection during transport inside my camera backpack for added security and protection. Best for storage but inconvenient for everyday useage.
customer_reviews.author: George Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I feel much safer keeping my lenses in these than in the bags they came with. My only complaint is that the smaller ones are very useful and the bigger one is HUGE. Needed to buy 2 sets to have more smaller ones. But they are affordable and that's OK. It would be nice if the lens hood could fit in there, too, but they aren't wide enough. Maybe they could incorporate a plan for lens hoods in a future product.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product and value.
customer_reviews.text: The small, medium, and large pouches fit my Nikon Nikkor AFS 18-55, 55-200, & 70-300 lenses respectively. The latter two will enclose the hoods in their stored position on the lens. The pouches are well-made and I believe this purchase was a great value. I recently completed a hike of several miles using this product to store and protect lenses in my backpack and was pleased with result. The belt loops on all except the small will fit on a 1-1/2" belt (actually the loop size increases with pouch size), this is the only drawback I see.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Ed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as pictured and expected. Note the sizes though, I wish some of those larger cases were a bit smaller for my smaller lenses. Overall it is soft on the inside and neoprene on the outside. the way it closes on the top is nice since it doesn't fold over the lens like other cases. retiring the bubble wrap system i used to store lenses when not in use and moving to this!
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: These are great as an added layer of protection for your lenses
customer_reviews.text: These are great as an added layer of protection for your lenses, I don't always carry my full camera bag and wanted something to protect my lenses. Snug fitting with just enough padding to give you an extra layer of safety. I like them so much I started leaving the lenses in them when I put them back into my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT FIT MY LENS but the customer service was phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I have Nikon lens and they did not fit into these holders. I guess I should have measured it but I didn't even doubt it because the description claims it is for Nikon (as well as other lens) . It does look well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Worth it for 55-210mm and 14-45mm lens
customer_reviews.text: Use every day to carry my lens and accessories 55-210 lens is too big for the small and too small for right large... but I just put it in the large along with my clothes. Might be nice to have a more fitted sleeve dog it but still no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JStarr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: **Update: Upon seeing that I wasn't 100% happy with this product, the company reached out to make amends and have definitely smoothed things over. I didn't expect anything from them and am COMPLETELY satisfied with our transaction. Excellent customer service! They're kind of tight when you're storing the lens hoods as well as the lens, but they're made of great material for protecting the glass.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some single pouches for various lenses,from 18-55 mm,and larger.These fit the bill perfectly. Nicely padded for extra protection. They allow me to switch lenses when I am out shooting. I have many lenses,so will purchase more of these.Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: Great lens bags at a great price for DX lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great lens bags at a great price. These will work great for your DX lenses. I originally bought them for my Nikon FX lenses, but the cases were to small and returned them back to amazon. I may purchase them for my Daughter Nikon DX lenses when she travels in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L

customer_reviews.title: The construction is good but they are too big for my lenses
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. The construction is good but they are too big for my lenses. I have a 35mm, 50mm, a 55-200 and the kit lens 18-55. They work pretty good for my other equipment though. UPDATE - 4/1/18 Customer Care read and responded to my review. My issue has been resolved to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: April R

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for travel. Came in handy for hiking! The only downside when you first get them is they really smell bad like I guess a harsh chemical smell. Kind of skechy but eventually smell goes away. Overall good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I received a new 24mm lens as a Christmas gift and wanted something I could store it in (it fits perfectly in the small pouch) and wanted something I could store my other lens in when using the 24. These feel really well made and I feel like they protect my investments perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kesilewski

customer_reviews.title: Not for big lens
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have big lenses they will not fit, these are a tight fit and your lens hoods will also not fit if left on. Other than that they are very nice and great quality. I am hoping with use they will wear enough to get my lenses in an out easily.
customer_reviews.author: R.Garcia

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well padded and fits a great range of lenses. Easy to use and grab on the go. Not bulky so it fits well in camera bag compartments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rey D.

customer_reviews.title: adequate
customer_reviews.text: Like these bags. They give adequate minimal protection to my Cannon lenses. Only rated 3 stars because one of the bags lost it's pull string closure, could have been made a little better.
customer_reviews.author: kevin sato

customer_reviews.title: Cheap insurance. I use them both to store and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap insurance. I use them both to store and protect my lens, as well as to carry a second lens on my hip when travelling light in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Protect your lens investment
customer_reviews.text: These are super for protecting your lenses when traveling. The neoprene is thick and durable. I don't worry about my lenses at all when using these.
customer_reviews.author: kniTp

customer_reviews.title: You get  alot for your money but they are narrow.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if a wider one was included too. These are very narrow, but fast lenses have large pieces of glass in front. These are too skinny for fast glass. Otherwise, good construction and good protection for the lenses that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be for lenses, I have an Olympus Air, it fits perfectly in the small pouch and that pouch fits with other accessories into a bigger pouch, I don't even carry a camera bag anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These cases have very nice quality. When I put my lenses in a backpack, I don't have any fear that they will be damaged at all. It was nice being able to use one for my Sony A6500 body with plenty of room to spare. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Sales it’s self.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality love the clips it comes with. Great to strap a extra lens to belt when you don’t want to bring whole camera bag. Since using two photographer friends liked so much the got their own.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy.  This is the better design...
customer_reviews.text: I bought both of the popular neoprene lens cases thinking there was no real difference.. But there is. This is by far the better design with the enclosure not affecting the sides of the sleeve. This one closes the top flat unsteady of pinching it. Minor difference but very noticeable when using both styles.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great lense pouches. It would be great if you could order specific quantities of the sizes in a group of four. It would also be helpful if the belt loop on the side was longer and the hook was the next size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Odyssey Four

customer_reviews.title: Great portability for lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to carry my extra lens right on my hip so I don't have to drag the whole camera bag along with me. Makes it easy to switch out lenses while I'm on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super soft inside and I love that it’s purple (my fave color). It protects my lenses perfectly. I bought a belt to attach them too for quick switching between my lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kish

customer_reviews.title: great quality, very durable
customer_reviews.text: great quality, very durable! i'm putting my lens in these bags and can just grab them and put in any backpack or bags when i go out, no more special camera bags needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lehcar

customer_reviews.title: Well-padded
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky but well-padded and protects my mini drone and Sony zv-1
customer_reviews.author: #DrCharityTV

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These pouches were better than expected. Keeps my lenses safe.
customer_reviews.author: musicman in az.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for protecting and storing my lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great lens storage cases
customer_reviews.text: Great lens storage cases. Sizes are a little weird smallest one to small for my smallest lens and biggest one is really big but the middle 2 sizes are perfect for my most used lens. It came with a lens cleaning cloth - i put one in the bottom of each bag so quick to grab when i put the lens on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing person

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. They are sturdy yet light. The variety of sizes were great for my various lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M. Costigan

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Work great. Good protection. Now i don't have to take my whole gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anderson LLC

customer_reviews.title: I love this cases!
customer_reviews.text: They are great to travel and protect the lenses in my backpack, or leave it protected from humidity at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Presutti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Protective Cases for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers - they're light, but padded enough to protect my lenses during travel. Sizes accommodate a variety of lenses and they're priced right.
customer_reviews.author: eemscully

customer_reviews.title: Lens hazard
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for the price but the sizes of the bags inside don’t fit any of the standard lens is prime lenses or anything usable.Lenses are difficult to get in and out and not usable as a porch and Photographer I need to be able to switch lenses quickly and safely this might cause you to drop your lens
customer_reviews.author: joseph n.

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend the product. The pouches are exactly as expected. I have Sony mirrorless lenses. Material is made of very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zeynur Babayev

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little snug
customer_reviews.text: These Lens pouches are good but the opening is snug. My Nikon 80-200 can fit but I have to work it in. Also they can not fit with lens hoods on. Would I buy again? Yes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very spongy inside, the thickness is ok, how it closes, and how you can hold it, everything ok, its just a good product, with very good quality and perfect pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Incompu

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and bulky enough to have a comfortable amount of protection
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lens bags. I love these. Very lightweight but bulky enough to have a comfortable amount of protection. They weigh nothing and are perfect for my lenses just stray in a backpack on Safari in Africa.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It has chemical smells and seems it does not fit in my Canon lens. too small.
customer_reviews.author: George-USA

customer_reviews.title: Wish you could buy cases individually
customer_reviews.text: The cases them selves are very nice, but I wish I could buy them separately, because I don't need the larger two and and need more of the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Leesha

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Tight
customer_reviews.text: These pouches give my lenses extra protection in my carry bag. There is one thing I have a problem with and that is they are a smug fit with no room for the attached lens hoods. I'll have to pack them separate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Very handy when you have more then one lens. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy when you have more then one lens. I used large pouch bag for both 18-55 mm and 70-300 mm lens that came with Nikon D3400 camera while I traveled to Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Mikhelson

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: love the different size pouches and very thick and really safe protection for my camera lenses.
customer_reviews.author: miriena

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine
customer_reviews.text: The range of sizes is really nice. Quality is fine. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Ari - NYC

customer_reviews.title: Effective.Nice set of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Good padding, I like the drawstring closure. Not too bulky. Like the sewn on handle. Well made, though not the most professional looking with the purple but effective and economical. I'll use the largest size for protecting a wine bottle while traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection for lenses when I don't want to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice protection for lenses when I don't want to carry a full camera bag. Well made, all seams are intact and appear to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Belt loop
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to carry camera lenses on my belt but the smaller ones won't accommodate a belt. Other than the belt loop they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: George Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well Padded
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. A caution: The lenses take up more room in the camera bag, making for a tight fit when carrying multiple lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Good for carrying an extra lens and filters
customer_reviews.text: Good for carrying an extra lens and filters. Also has a clip to hang them from belt or bag.
customer_reviews.author: warren c simmons

customer_reviews.title: Lens Bag Review
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s purpose. Kept my lenses safe during our trip to Spain
customer_reviews.author: MTran

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags and great protection for my lenses
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how big these bags are but glad to have them. They will keep my lenses safe. I have two cameras with external lenses. This is a wonderful asset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Pure quality! The padding is great. I feel very comfortable carrying my lenses in these for extra protection.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bags
customer_reviews.text: Well made and seem to hold up well even with heavy lenses. Like these a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Big bulky
customer_reviews.text: Big bulky some lens tight others big.Water resistance but not from the top?

customer_reviews.title: Powerextra 4 Pk Lens Pouch Bags:  Excellent quality, snug fit, nice padding--great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pouches for my lenses: Snug fit, nice padding and excellent quality. I'll order two more sets!
customer_reviews.author: T-ITUP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for carrying and protecting lenses, and are a great value.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and the protection for my lenses is excellent. A very good buy!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. The neoprene is a good weight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The neoprene is a good weight. There is a tie on each case. What was the best feature the extra material that helps secure the lens in place.

customer_reviews.title: Great lens bags!
customer_reviews.text: Though I’ve seen better padded ones, these seem to do the job. Great for grabbing one lens on-the-go without having to bring my big bag of lenses.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and at a great price to boot. Will purchase again if needed.

customer_reviews.title: These lens pouches are great for both lens and all the "do-dads" I need ...

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: I like it , I used it for my camera lens
customer_reviews.author: john goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Happy with quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. They hold my camera lenses while keeping them safe from elements or dropping them. They can clip on your purse or belt so you don't have to carry a camera bag. I would order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: lucky

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit on the small.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for extra padding when backpacking. The small is snug for my 18-55 lens, but it fit. The others fit perfectly on my variety of lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Iordertoomuchstuff!

customer_reviews.title: Thick and good protection. I use them when I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick and good protection. I use them when I have to carry my lenses in my backpack. Large is bigger than my 300 mm lens.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very confident that my lenses and gear is protected. . These are built to last. I am a happy camper!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality bags. They are better than I expected.

customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my wife's camera lenses! She thinks they are wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Durable

customer_reviews.text: These are identical to the Kanoni pouches, and @ $11.99 for four, are $4 less expensive. High quality. I find the small and medium most useful; the x-large are good for chilled wine....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Powerextra 4 x Lens Case Lens Pouch Bag with Thick Protective Neoprene Soft Plush Compatible with DSLR Camera Lens (Canon, Nikon, Sony, Olympus, Panasonic,etc) Includes: Small, Medium, Large, X Large
product_meta.description:
Powerextra Thick Protective Neoprene Lens Pouch Set(4 Pack) One of each size- S, M, L, XL 

This 4-pack includes all 4 sizes of the Powerextra Neoprene Lens Pouches. The lens pouches featured with super soft interior lining, 5mm extra thick padded bottom, and water resistant neoprene exterior with clips.

Features
- Thick water-proof neoprene with thick soft plush protects lens against moisture, sand, dust, accidental bumps and scratches.
- Strong drawstring and lock catch are designed for easily storing and carrying.
- Reinforced belt loop and snap and swivel clip provides a convenient and secure way to hang your pouch to you bagpack or bag 
- Compatible with lenses from Canon, Sony, Nikon, Olympus, Fuji, Pentax, Panasonic, Leica, Sigma, Tamron, and more

Note: Do not let this pouch come in contact with: acetone, iodine, hydrogen peroxide, kerosene, bleach, or motor oil. These may cause the neoprene material to decay.

Dimensions:
- S: 3.1" x 4" (w x h)
- M: 4" x 5.5" (w x h)
- L: 4" x 7.1" (w x h)
